程序包 Boundary

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AddDishes
    ClassName: AddDishes
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding dishes with ranking options
    AddExtraDishes
    ClassName: AddExtraDishes
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding extra dishes
    AddOption
    ClassName: AddOption
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding another option to the existing dish
    AddPayment
    ClassName: AddPayment
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding another payment way for the customer
    AutomaticReport
    ClassName: AutomaticReport
    Description: This is the GUI interface of configure the email setting.
    DishAddChoose
    ClassName: DishAddChoose
    Description: This is the GUI interface of choosing the dish
    that wants to add has ranking options(three options) or just simple option(one option)
    managementOptions
    ClassName: managementOptions
    Description: This is the GUI interface of choosing managing services(modify menu, see report, add payment)
    managePayment
    ClassName: managePayment
    Description: This is the GUI interface of managing the payment.
    Like setting availability, adding or deleting a payment way.
    managerLogin
    ClassName: managerLogin
    Description: This is the GUI interface of doing the authorization of manager
    ModifyCompulsoryDish
    ClassName: ModifyCompulsoryDish
    Description: This is the GUI setting interface of a compulsory dish.
    Function contains: adding options, changing option availability, deleting this dish.
    ModifyExtraDish
    ClassName: ModifyExtraDish
    Description: This is the GUI setting interface of an extra dish.
    Function contains: changing dish price, changing option availability, deleting this dish.
    ModifyMenu
    ClassName: ModifyMenu
    Description: This is the GUI interface of choosing which dish to modify or choosing to add a dish.
    ReportShow
    ClassName: ReportShow
    Description: This is the GUI interface showing the report of business condition in the last seven days
    SimpleOption
    ClassName: SimpleOption
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding dishes with simple options(yes or no)
